grafana-alert-notification.body:
resource "grafana_alert_notification" "$1" {
    # type - (Required) The type of the alert notification channel.
    type = ""

    # name - (Required) The name of the alert notification channel.
    name = ""

    # is_default - (Optional) Is this the default channel for all your alerts.
    is_default = ""

    # settings - (Optional) Additional settings, for full reference lookup [Grafana HTTP API documentation](http://docs.grafana.org/http_api/alerting).
    settings = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - The ID of the resource
}
grafana-alert-notification.description: The alert notification resource allows an alert notification channel to be created on a Grafana server.

grafana-resource-dashboard.description: The dashboard resource allows a dashboard to be created on a Grafana server.

grafana-resource-data-source.body:
resource "grafana_data_source" "$1" {
    # url - (Required) The URL for the data source. The type of URL required varies depending on the chosen data source type.
    url = ""

    # name - (Required) A unique name for the data source within the Grafana server.
    name = ""

    # type - (Required) The data source type. Must be one of the data source keywords supported by the Grafana server.
    type = ""

    # is_default - (Optional) If true, the data source will be the default source used by the Grafana server. Only one data source on a server can be the default.
    is_default = ""

    # basic_auth_enabled - (Optional) - If true, HTTP basic authentication will be used to make requests.
    basic_auth_enabled = ""

    # basic_auth_username - (Optional) (Required if `basic_auth_enabled` is true) The username to use for basic auth.
    basic_auth_username = ""

    # basic_auth_password - (Optional) (Required if `basic_auth_enabled` is true) The password to use for basic auth.
    basic_auth_password = ""

    # username - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The username to use to authenticate to the data source.
    username = ""

    # password - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The password to use to authenticate to the data source.
    password = ""

    # json_data - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The default region and authentication type to access the data source. `json_data` is documented in more detail below.
    json_data = ""

    # secure_json_data - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The access and secret keys required to access the data source. `secure_json_data` is documented in more detail below.
    secure_json_data = ""

    # database_name - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The name of the database to use on the selected data source server.
    database_name = ""

    # access_mode - (Optional) The method by which the browser-based Grafana application will access the data source. The default is "proxy", which means that the application will make requests via a proxy endpoint on the Grafana server.
    access_mode = ""

    # auth_type - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The authentication type type used to access the data source.
    auth_type = ""

    # default - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The default region for the data source.
    default = ""

    # access_key - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The access key required to access the data source.
    access_key = ""

    # secret_key - (Optional) (Required by some data source types) The secret key required to access the data source.
    secret_key = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - The opaque unique id assigned to the data source by the Grafana
    # "secret_key" - (Required by some data source types) The secret key required to access the data source.
}
grafana-resource-data-source.description: The data source resource allows a data source to be created on a Grafana server.
